identity.mission: Create a modern, culturally respectful, and highly functional interface for a Pesantren management system. Fusion of traditional Islamic aesthetics with Swiss-style precision.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Islamic geometry with modern SaaS layouts.
Emotion First: Trust, Serenity, and Professionalism.
Content is King: Data clarity for admin, ease of use for parents/staff.
Contrast: High contrast for readability, subtle textures for depth.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Hero text

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI labels, Data tables, Buttons

mono.usage: Code snippets, ID numbers, Technical data

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.html: <link href='https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Playfair+Display:wght@600;700&family=Plus+Jakarta+Sans:wght@400;500;600;700&family=JetBrains+Mono&display=swap' rel='stylesheet'>

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1). Use darker shades of primary/secondary for text on light backgrounds.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install fonts: Add the Google Fonts link to public/index.html.
2. Configure Tailwind: Update tailwind.config.js with the new color palette, font families, and border radius.
3. Global CSS: Update index.css to set the base styles (font-family, background color).
4. Layout Implementation: Create separate layout components for 'AdminLayout' (Sidebar) and 'MobileLayout' (BottomNav).
5. Component Customization: Update Shadcn components in components/ui to match the 'visual_enhancers' (radius, shadows).
6. Page Polish: Apply the 'Bento Grid' to the Admin Dashboard and 'Card Stack' to Mobile Dashboards.
9. DO NOT use gradients for main backgrounds; use solid colors or subtle patterns.
10. Keep the UI 'Clean' and 'Holy' - avoid clutter.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts or default blue colors.
Micro-interactions: Add hover states, active states, and simple transitions.
Spacing: Use generous padding (p-6, p-8) to create breathing room.
Mobile First: Ensure all PWA views are perfectly optimized for touch.
Dark Mode: Support it, but prioritize the 'Light/Holy' theme as default.
